question.string: Give me all female Russian astronauts.
Give me the birthdays of all actors of the television show Charmed.
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?date WHERE { res:Charmed dbo:starring ?actor . ?actor dbo:birthDate ?date . }

question.string: Who is the daughter of Bill Clinton married to?
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { res:Bill_Clinton dbo:child ?child . ?child dbp:spouse ?string . ?uri rdfs:label ?string . }

question.string: Which river does the Brooklyn Bridge cross?
How many monarchical countries are there in Europe?
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ?uri) WHERE { ?uri rdf:type yago:EuropeanCountries . ?uri dbo:governmentType ?govern . FILTER regex(?govern,'monarchy') . }

question.string: Where did Abraham Lincoln die?
Is the wife of president Obama called Michelle?
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> ASK WHERE { res:Barack_Obama dbo:spouse ?spouse . ?spouse rdfs:label ?name . FILTER(regex(?name,'Michelle')) }

question.string: Which states of Germany are governed by the Social Democratic Party?
question.keywords: Germany, Social Democratic Party, state, governed

question.string: Which U.S. states possess gold minerals?
question.query: PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type yago:StatesOfTheUnitedStates . ?uri dbp:mineral ?mineral . FILTER (regex(?mineral,'Gold')) . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

question.string: In which country does the Nile start?
Which countries have places with more than two caves?
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?cave rdf:type dbo:Cave . ?cave dbo:location ?uri . ?uri rdf:type dbo:Country . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } } GROUP BY ?uri ?string HAVING (COUNT(?cave) > 2)

question.string: Is proinsulin a protein?
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> ASK WHERE { res:Proinsulin rdf:type dbo:Protein . }

question.string: Which classis does the Millepede belong to?
question.query: PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { res:Millipede dbp:classis ?string . ?uri rdfs:label ?string . }

question.string: How tall is Claudia Schiffer?
Who created Goofy?
Give me the capitals of all countries in Africa.
Give me all cities in New Jersey with more than 100000 inhabitants.
question.keywords: New Jersey, city, inhabitants, more than 100000
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:City . ?uri dbo:isPartOf res:New_Jersey . ?uri dbp:populationTotal ?inhabitants . FILTER (?inhabitants > 100000) . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

question.string: Which museum exhibits The Scream by Munch?
Is Egypts largest city also its capital?
question.query: PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> ASK WHERE { res:Egypt dbo:largestCity ?large . res:Egypt dbo:capital ?capital . FILTER (?large = ?capital) }

question.string: How many employees does IBM have?
Which states border Illinois?
In which country is the Limerick Lake?
Which television shows were created by Walt Disney?
Which mountain is the highest after the Annapurna?
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { res:Annapurna dbo:elevation ?elevation . ?uri rdf:type dbo:Mountain . ?uri dbo:elevation ?otherelevation . FILTER (?otherelevation < ?elevation) . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } } ORDER BY DESC(?otherelevation) LIMIT 1

question.string: In which films directed by Garry Marshall was Julia Roberts starring?
question.keywords: film, directed, Garry Marhsall, starring, Julia Roberts
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Film . ?uri dbo:starring res:Julia_Roberts . ?uri dbo:director res:Garry_Marshall . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

question.string: Which bridges are of the same type as the Manhattan Bridge?
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Bridge . ?uri dbp:design ?design . res:Manhattan_Bridge dbp:design ?mdesign . FILTER (regex(?design, ?mdesign)). FILTER (?uri != res:Manhattan_Bridge) . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

question.string: Was U.S. president Jackson involved in a war?
Which European countries have a constitutional monarchy?
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type yago:EuropeanCountries . ?uri dbo:governmentType res:Constitutional_monarchy . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

question.string: Which awards did WikiLeaks win?
Which state of the USA has the highest population density?
question.query: PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type yago:StatesOfTheUnitedStates . ?uri dbp:densityrank ?rank . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } } ORDER BY ASC(?rank) LIMIT 1

question.string: What is the currency of the Czech Republic?
Which countries in the European Union adopted the Euro?
What is the area code of Berlin?
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?string WHERE { res:Berlin dbo:areaCode ?string . }

question.string: Which countries have more than two official languages?
question.keywords: official language, country, more than two
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Country . ?uri dbo:officialLanguage ?language . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } } GROUP BY ?uri ?string HAVING (COUNT(?language) > 2)

question.string: Who is the owner of Universal Studios?
Through which countries does the Yenisei river flow?
When did Finland join the EU?
Which monarchs of the United Kingdom were married to a German?
question.query: PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type yago:MonarchsOfTheUnitedKingdom . ?uri dbo:spouse ?spouse . ?spouse dbo:birthPlace res:Germany. OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

question.string: When was the Battle of Gettysburg?
What is the highest mountain in Australia?
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Mountain . ?uri dbo:locatedInArea res:Australia . ?uri dbo:elevation ?elevation . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } } ORDER BY DESC(?elevation) LIMIT 1

question.string: Give me all soccer clubs in Spain.
What are the official languages of the Philippines?
Who is the mayor of New York City?
Who designed the Brooklyn Bridge?
Which telecommunications organizations are located in Belgium?
Is Frank Herbert still alive?
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> ASK WHERE { res:Frank_Herbert dbo:deathDate ?date . FILTER (!BOUND(?date)) }

question.string: What is the highest place of Karakoram?
Give me the homepage of Forbes.
Give me all companies in the advertising industry.
question.query: PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Company . ?uri dbp:industry ?industry . FILTER regex(?industry,'advertising','i') . OPTIONAL {?uri rdfs:label ?string . FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

question.string: What did Bruce Carver die from?
Give me all school types.
Which presidents were born in 1945?
Give me all presidents of the United States.
question.query: PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Person . { ?uri rdf:type yago:PresidentsOfTheUnitedStates. } UNION { ?uri rdf:type dbo:President. ?uri dbp:title res:President_of_the_United_States. } ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en' && !regex(?string,'Presidency','i') && !regex(?string,'and the')) . }

question.string: Which mountains are higher than the Nanga Parbat?
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { res:Nanga_Parbat dbp:elevationM ?elevation . ?uri rdf:type dbo:Mountain . ?uri dbp:elevationM ?otherelevation . FILTER (?otherelevation > ?elevation) . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string . FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

question.string: Who created Wikipedia?

question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?company rdf:type dbo:Organisation . ?company dbo:foundationPlace res:California . ?uri dbo:developer ?company . ?uri rdf:type dbo:Software . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string . FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

question.string: Which companies work in the aerospace industry as well as on nuclear reactor technology?

question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Company . ?uri dbp:industry res:Aerospace . ?uri dbp:industry res:Nuclear_reactor_technology . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string . FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

question.string: Is Christian Bale starring in Batman Begins?
Give me the websites of companies with more than 500000 employees.
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?string WHERE { ?subject rdf:type dbo:Company . ?subject dbp:numEmployees ?employees . FILTER( xsd:integer(?employees) > 500000 ) . ?subject foaf:homepage ?string . }

question.string: Which actors were born in Germany?

FILTER (?entrance > 3) . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string . FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }
